auditLogBundleVo

Summary
A summary of a bundle of changes made to a single domain model.


Fields Type Attributes Description
displayString  abstractText
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		A human readable semi-unique value used to identify each model. This typically uses something like the model's name or code which is expected to be unique enough to distinish between the different values within a particular project.  
displaySummary  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The short summary describing the bundle.  
displayUserName  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The user's name for display  
domainBundleUid  uid
max length: 30
allows printable 		required
  		I am used to identity a bundle of logs related to a particular domain. In many cases, a particular domain will have multiple fields modified at the same time. The bundle identifies this group of changes. Sometimes multiple bundles may occur within the same transaction for the same domain.  
domainName  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		required
  		The common, but non-unique name of the domain. Models generally rely on long UIDs as their unique identifier so we also store a domain's display string as a 'name'. Although this name is not guaranteed to be unique, it is generally human-readable and is usually sufficient to identify which domain was affected.  
domainType  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		required
  		The type of domain; e.g.: project, depot, salesOrderLine, etc.  
domainTypeLabel  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		A more friendly format of the domain type. E.g.: project => Project; salesOrderLine => Sales Order Line; etc.  
domainUid  uid
max length: 30
allows printable 		required
  		The unique id of the domain model.  
logLocalDate  date abstract
  		The log date based on the user's local timezone.  
logLocalTime  time abstract
  		The log time of day based on the user's local timezone.  
logLocalTs  timestamp abstract
  		The log timestamp converted to the user's local timezone.  
logLocalTsMessage  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		abstract
  		The log timestamp converted to the user's local timezone, and formatted as a string that includes the timezone code.  
logUtcTs  timestamp required
  		The time this change was made.  
transactionUid  uid
max length: 30
allows printable 		required
  		A unique identifier of the database transaction.  
typeCode  longEnumCode
max length: 30
allows letters
allows digits
allows symbols 		required
enum
  		The type of change.  
typeName  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		abstract
  		The type of change.  
userName  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		  The user's name (denormalized).
